entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: NNE 40 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
